Fairfield.Solano County Library: The Solano County Library is a public library system serving the cities of Fairfield, Rio Vista, Suisun City, Vacaville and Vallejo, California. The library system consists of eight public libraries, and additionally the Solano County Law Library and the Solano County Library Adult Literacy Program. The cities of Benicia and Dixon have public libraries that are not a part of the Solano County Library system but are partners of the SPLASH Consortium.
